str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
A rock, ledge, cliff, cave, stony ground. Feminine of the same as Petros; a rock.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To take, receive, accept, welcome. Middle voice of a primary verb; to receive.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.
Joy, gladness, a source of joy. From chairo; cheerfulness, i.e. Calm delight.
And, even, also, namely.
This; he, she, it.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
A root, shoot, source; that which comes from the root, a descendent. Apparently a primary word; a 'root'.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.
Fitting season, season, opportunity, occasion, time. Of uncertain affinity; an occasion, i.e. Set or proper time.
And, even, also, namely.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Fitting season, season, opportunity, occasion, time. Of uncertain affinity; an occasion, i.e. Set or proper time.
From peirazo; a putting to proof (of good), experience (of evil), solicitation, discipline or provocation); by implication, adversity.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From apo and histemi; to remove, i.e. instigate to revolt; usually to desist, desert, etc.
